text: Aur (aey Muhammad) tumse pehle humne na koi Rasool aisa bheja hai na Nabi (jiske saath yeh maamla na pesh aaya ho ke) jab usne tamanna ki, shaytan uski tamanna mein khalal andaz ho gaya. Is tarah jo kuch bhi shaytan khalal andaziyan karta hai Allah unko mita deta hai aur apni aayat ko pukhta (confirm) kardeta hai. Allah aleem hai aur hakeem
